attributes.action: Add an option to sign against a petition to the e petitions site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Transport secretary Douglas Alexander claimed on national television that a petition for road pricing would get as many or more votes as one against.

The goverment should put its money where its mouth is - add an option to this existing e petitions site so that anyone with strong views opposing a petition can mark them against it - so that both the goverment and the people can see how many support each side of each issue.

rejection.details:
This has been dealt with in our faqs:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/faq
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
